headline: Great workplace, lots to learn, fun place but no direction to the company
pros:
Its a great learning opportunity for anyone. Work / Career growth is entirely dependent on the team (same as any other big company). Quality of work for experienced developers is one of the best in the country compared to any other company in India (except startups). Its a heaven for experienced developers to showcase their design skills and at the same time have work life balance.
The facilities (transport, etc) are extremely good.
People are very friendly and supportive. As a fresher out of college, I had great guidance.
If you want to do something on the side, do some great work with great facilities, then this is the place.
Hackdays, ideas, etc - Awesome work culture with great people
Also, this is the place which has / had one of the greatest engineers on planet - The beginning of web
cons:
The goals of the company are not clear to anyone.
Its in a deadlock state as far as business is concerned. Only a miracle (like Apple's regain of fame) can save the company.
The compensation is extremely low even for people from premier institutes of the country.
